markdownRemark.html:
This post is part of an ongoing series in which I document my journey through the COVID-19 quarantine. See Day 1 for full context.

Quick update

Super productive day working on open source all day: ngx-cool-dialogs is now called ng-popups. I also wrote an article with my findings about some moniker naming rules I wasn’t aware of. I also made some progress on logo-quiz: new PR to jump to next logo after logo verification.

frontmatter.title: How to check NPM package availability
